edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate

Class ScoreCachingSenone

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.ScoreCachingSenone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Senone, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeSenone, GaussianMixture

    public abstract class ScoreCachingSenone
extends java.lang.Object
implements Senone
    Implements a Senone that contains a cache of the last scored data.

    Subclasses should implement the abstract calculateScore(edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.Data) method, which is called by the getScore(edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.Data) method to calculate the score for each cache miss.

    Note: this implementation is thread-safe and can be safely used across different threads without external synchronization.

    Author:
    Yaniv Kunda
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        public float getScore(Data feature)
        Gets the cached score for this senone based upon the given feature. If the score was not cached, it is calculated using calculateScore(edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.Data), cached, and then returned.
        Specified by:
        getScore in interface Senone
        Parameters:
        feature - the feature vector to score this senone against
        Returns:
        the score for this senone in LogMath log base
